contrast.title: Compare Metagenomes - Linear Regression
contrast.description: The pangenome composition of groups of metagenomes may be compared using one or more categories specified in the sample metadata.

formula.title: Formula
formula.description: Either the name of a single metadata column used to compare samples, or a formula specifying multiple columns (e.g. colA + colB)

assign_metadata.title: Assign Metadata
assign_metadata.description: Optionally, use pandas assign syntax to add columns to the metadata table prior to analysis.

filter.title: Filter Samples
filter.description: Parameters used to specify which samples are included in the analysis.

min_n_reads.title: Minimum Number of Aligned Reads
min_n_reads.description: Samples with fewer than this number of reads aligned to the pangenome will be excluded from the analysis.

min_n_genes.title: Minimum Number of Genes Detected
min_n_genes.description: Samples with fewer than this number of genes detected from the pangenome will be excluded from the analysis.
